Workshop in Waterloo ON Canada in April 2016

Home Overview Program Speakers Registration

Challenges and Opportunities for Governance of Socio-Ecological Systems in Comparative Perspective April 20-22 2016

The purpose of this two-day workshop is to bring together experts on environmental governance, socio-ecological systems, and social networks. Our primary objectives are to identify new connections between these fields, promote international comparative approaches, and facilitate new collaborative relationships.

More information will be posted to this website in the coming weeks.

July 31, 2015

John McLevey, University of Waterloo, john.mclevey@uwaterloo.ca
Vanessa Schweizer, University of Waterloo, vanessa.schweizer@uwaterloo.ca
Mark Stoddart, Memorial University, mstoddart@mun.ca
